bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for a Protection Profile in Operational Environment A
IEEE Standard for a Protection Profile in Operational Environment A

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard is for a protection profile for hardcopy devices in a restrictive commercial information processing environment in which a relatively high level of document security, operational accountability, and information assurance are required. Typical information processed in this environment is trade secret, mission critical, or subject to legal and regulatory considerations such as for privacy or governance. This environment is not intended to support life-critical or national security applications. This environment will be known as "Operational Environment A".

Standard for a Protection Profile for Hardcopy Devices in a restrictive commercial information processing environment in which a relatively high level of document security, operational accountability, and information assurance, are required. Typical information processed in this environment is trade secret, mission-critical, or subject to legal and regulatory considerations such as for privacy or governance. This environment is not intended to support life-critical or national security applications. This environment will be known as “Operational Environment A.”.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
